meanings: (Tw, HK) (finance) unit of 25 basis points (i.e. a 0.25% change in interest rate)
(bound form) standard weight used with a balance scale
(coll.) kilometers per hour (informal misuse of "yard" to mean kph in speed references)
classifier for matters, items, situations etc (esp. when indicating whether they are the same or different, as in 不是一碼事|不是一码事[bu4 shi4 yi1 ma3 shi4] "not the same thing")
